title: Azzedine Amanallah
text:
Azzedine Amanallah (born April 7, 1956) is a retired <a href="Morocco">Moroccan</a> professional <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
He spent his most of his professional career in <a href="France">France</a> and was also part of the Moroccan squad at the <a href="1986%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">1986 FIFA World Cup</a>.
